text: Hello! My name is Merlène. I am a PhD student at the university of Reunion Island. I am working on the population dynamics of the tropical seabird in the western Indian ocean for conservation biology. I have experience with mark-recaptured analysis only with MARK but currently I have to build Integrated Population Models, which used bayesian statistics, to improve my analysis. I am so very enthusiastic to learn more about bayesian statistic with this workshop!
